resources.string: C
Hello blank fragment
Coding will start from section 3

As you might have read in the bottom navigation plate that this zone is for code but since we have only done the introduction part so we will begin coding from the 3rd section, since the next section will also going to be mainly about setting up the editor, environment for working in C.
m
PROCEED TO NEXT SECTION
Write and Execute a program that prints your name.
Write and execute a program to print the sum of 10 and 5.
Write and execute a program that prints your name and your school name.
Write a program that prints the product of 10 and 2500 and prints like "2500*10 = 'ans' "

NOTE - Some of these program might be more understandable to you after you go through the next section, so if you dont get these program now dont worry in the next section you will understand then you can go through these again :)/n
W and E a program to show the use of float, int and char data types.
Write a program to store 37,98.7,\'345\',\'A\' inside different data types and then print them in separate lines.
Write and execute a program to add 2 numbers 23 and 33.456 by storing them in their correct data types then printing the output as an integer value(without decimal places).
Write and execute a program to print a float value without points/decimal places.
Write a program to take 2 integer inputs and print the total of those values.
Write and Execute a program like we did above by taking 2 numbers as input but this time perform subtraction,division and multiplication also.
Write a program to check that the given number is positive or negative.
Write and Execute a program to reverse a 2 digit int value.

W and E a program that checks whether the given number is the square of any number between 2 and 7 or not,If its a square of the number from 2 and 7 print YES otherwise print NO .\n
for ex - input number = 25\n \t output - YES.

Write and Execute a program that prints the number(between 1 and 8) taken as input from the user in words.
 For example-:
 	input - 7
 	output - SEVEN.
Write and Execute a program that prints the table of 19 using for loop.
Write a program that takes two values from the user a and b and prints the values from a to b.

Write and Execute a program that prints the table of 25 but only for the odd places or values.
 for example -:
 	25x1 = 25
 go to the next odd place i.e. 3
 25 x 3 = 75
Write a program that prints all the even numbers between 0 and 51 using while loop.
Write and Execute a program that reverses the given int number.

Write and Execute a program that prints the words for number between 1 and 5 inserted by user by using the switch case.
 for ex - : 
	 input = 1
	 output = ONE
Write and Execute a program that checks whether a number is divisible by 5 and then checks that if its even or odd with the use of nested if-else.

W and E a program to build a calculator that inputs 2 number from user and then give the user choice for the option between +,-,*,/ and then uses the switch case to implement those operations. \n Note - : you should be able to make this program on your own but even after trying many times if you are unable to implement this program there is a similar program in next section, although try to make it work on your own.
Write and Execute a program to build an interactive calculator with the use of functions.
Write a function in C that prints all the even numbers between 2 values passed to it.

Write a program with a function that checks whether the number sent to it as an argument is negative or positive.
for ex -:\n input -: -23\n output -: NEGATIVE VALUE
Write a program with a function that takes 3 value and returns the biggest value.
Write a function that prints the square of first 10 natural numbers.
